posts.post_content:
America's premiere collector of ultra rare high grade type cards is interested in upgrading current examples of T 208 and T 209 (four color)

T 208 should be 5 and above
T 209 should be 7 or 8 or SGC 60-88

please write in confidence with scans and your asking price


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List

[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]
